review_body: Cool app, but not accurate. App is reporting AQ at 98. I live in Salt Lake City, Utah. Our air quality is between 150-190 depending on which part of town your are in. Even our news is reporting it in the 150's at least. It is only pulling data from one station, probably the state run one that isn't ...Full ReviewCool app, but not accurate. App is reporting AQ at 98. I live in Salt Lake City, Utah. Our air quality is between 150-190 depending on which part of town your are in. Even our news is reporting it in the 150's at least. It is only pulling data from one station, probably the state run one that isn't maintained properly. We pull our data from Purple Air's website/sensors locally. I love the concept. People here do not take this seriously, and this would be a good tool to drive the point home.

There is something wrong with this app. Me and my sister checked AQI on different phone's but same location and results shown different.How it is possible ?. I think they should focus on this problem and remove asap.
Interesting information and everything but why does it cut all of my audio volume in half while it's open?
Works good with GPS But can't locate other locations on the search.
Air quality is presented in an easy to understand way.

While I like the concept, because this is how a laymen can relate to the severity of the pollution. I have a suggestion though. To get more accurate daily, weekly and monthly numbers, just keep the aggregating for the pollution level data on the device for the current location (and any saved locatio...Full ReviewWhile I like the concept, because this is how a laymen can relate to the severity of the pollution. I have a suggestion though. To get more accurate daily, weekly and monthly numbers, just keep the aggregating for the pollution level data on the device for the current location (and any saved location in case user is interested in that) and use it to calculate the values.

Great work. It will help to raise public awareness about pollution. 5 stars for the effort and ingenuity. Interface needs improvement. There should be an option to manually enter the AQI (like AQI measured by a portable device or purifier). The app should also show trends over weeks/months. Currentl...Full ReviewGreat work. It will help to raise public awareness about pollution. 5 stars for the effort and ingenuity. Interface needs improvement. There should be an option to manually enter the AQI (like AQI measured by a portable device or purifier). The app should also show trends over weeks/months. Currently it just multiplies the todays value by number of days for weekly/monthly calculation.
Very nice idea, but app gets "confused" with GPS and at the end I couldn't get location at all, had to manually enter place. Despite GPS (high accuracy) enabled.
Would be nice if there was an option for metric system.

What a great idea! Both funny and educational. Maybe it will make some parents think twice before sending their kids out without masks. (I wish it showed the cumulative amount of cigarettes for an entire 24 hrs rather than just current conditions.)

Great app to put air pollution into much easier to understand terms. Well done! I just wish the explanation of the math behind it clarified that (according to the source article) the cigarette comparison is compared to an average person's daily exposure to air pollution, not compared to being outsid...Full ReviewGreat app to put air pollution into much easier to understand terms. Well done! I just wish the explanation of the math behind it clarified that (according to the source article) the cigarette comparison is compared to an average person's daily exposure to air pollution, not compared to being outside all day. This makes the statistic even more alarming. Many articles are referencing this app due to wildfires, and they're getting this wrong.

Ingenious way to drive home just how dangerous air pollution is to human 
health! Love that I can easily share today's ratings with one tap. Sure 
there aren't a lot of extra whiz-bang features, but the app is still in the 
beginning stages & I'm sure the developers have more things planned. Right 
...Full ReviewIngenious way to drive home just how dangerous air pollution is to human 
health! Love that I can easily share today's ratings with one tap. Sure 
there aren't a lot of extra whiz-bang features, but the app is still in the 
beginning stages & I'm sure the developers have more things planned. Right 
now it does exactly what it says on the tin & honestly, that's all I want. 
Big props to the team who created this app & shared with the world!

Dishonest, at times. It shows air quality ratings at times based on 
monitoring stations nowhere near there. For example, when I searched for 
Plevna, a tiny village in eastern Ontario's cottage country, it gave a 
number based on monitoring 90 km away, which could be in downtown Kingston. 
It shows...Full ReviewDishonest, at times. It shows air quality ratings at times based on 
monitoring stations nowhere near there. For example, when I searched for 
Plevna, a tiny village in eastern Ontario's cottage country, it gave a 
number based on monitoring 90 km away, which could be in downtown Kingston. 
It shows multiple sites in Toronto, but all have the same rating - I have a 
hard time believing that the air quality at the bus terminal is the same as 
that on Toronto Island, in Lake Ontario. If there's no data for an area, be 
upfront about it. Show where the air quality information is coming from. 
That would make this app far more useful.

Nice service but why isn't it just a website? The last thing I need on my 
phone is yet another single use app. This isn't 2008. Apps aren't cool.

A great way to put air pollution into context. Very fast finding local air

nearest monitor. A simple, well thought out app üòÄ

Informative app that incorporates EPA air quality stats into relatable, 
easily disgestable content. Needs feature to change your location input so 
you can compare stats with other world locations. Is Iowa more polluted 
than Japan? What are rates like on the West Coast? Is there less 
particulate ...Full ReviewInformative app that incorporates EPA air quality stats into relatable, 
easily disgestable content. Needs feature to change your location input so 
you can compare stats with other world locations. Is Iowa more polluted 
than Japan? What are rates like on the West Coast? Is there less 
particulate pollution in federal parks than in rural areas? The ability to 
observe more than just your own zip code would be immeasurably helpful in 
answering questions like this.

location. Hope to see this improve! It has a lot of potential!
